A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I only signed up with RT to add my two cents on this film.  After watching the film on opening night\, my interest and excitement for the new trilogy got absolutely destroyed like that Gamorrean guard in Jabba's pit in ROTJ. Jar Jar Binks must be Rian Johnson's biggest fan now because someone else is in the running for the biggest disappointment in the Star Wars franchise.  If Disney gives the new trilogy to this poor excuse of director\, I'll be boycotting the new trilogy especially after what he did to Luke Skywalker's character: Unforgivable.
